/* Ecoupon.onlineCouponListEditN_D */ SELECT VDR_MST_IDX, VDR_MST_NM, VDR_MST_ERP_ID, VDR_MST_BUSI1, VDR_MST_BUSI2, VDR_MST_BUSI3, VDR_MST_CEO_NM, VDR_MST_MNG_NM, VDR_MST_USE_YN, VDR_MST_REG_DT FROM T_VDR_MST WHERE VDR_MST_IDX <> -1 /* MarketPlant는 보여주지 않는다. */ AND VDR_MST_ERP_ID IN (SELECT CPN.CPN_ETC_CD FROM T_CPN_ETC CPN WHERE CPN.CPN_ETC_GBN = #{CPN_MST_ETC_GBN} AND CPN.CPN_MST_IDX = #{CPN_MST_IDX} ) ORDER BY VDR_MST_REG_DT DESC

/*Ecoupon.selectMemberCouponListCount*/ SELECT COUNT(CPN.CPN_MST_IDX) FROM T_CPN_MST CPN, T_CPN_MEM MEM WHERE CPN.CPN_MST_IDX = MEM.CPN_MST_IDX AND MEM.CPN_MEM_ID = #{MEM_MST_MEM_ID} AND CPN.CPN_MST_YN = 'Y'

/* Ecoupon.selectMemberCouponList */ SELECT S2.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, S1.*, CASE WHEN CPN_MEM_USE_YN <> 'Y' AND SYSDATE > TO_DATE(CPN_USE_ED_DT,'yyyymmdd') THEN '사용기간만료' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CPN_MEM_USE_DT,'yyyymmddhh24miss'),'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') END AS CPN_USE_DT FROM ( SELECT CPN.CPN_MST_IDX, CPN.CPN_MST_GBN, (SELECT CMM.CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CPN_MST CPN2 JOIN T_CMM_COM CMM ON (CPN2.CPN_MST_GBN = CMM.CMN_COM_ETC1) WHERE CMM.CMN_COM_UP_IDX = 3029 AND CPN2.CPN_MST_IDX = CPN.CPN_MST_IDX) AS CPN_MST_GBN_NM, CPN.CPN_MST_TITLE, CPN.CPN_MST_SAL_GBN, CPN.CPN_MST_SAL_PRC, CPN.CPN_MST_SML_PRC, CPN.CPN_MST_MXM_PRC, CASE WHEN CPN_MST_ISU_DAY_GBN = 'A' THEN CPN_MST_USE_ST_DT ELSE SUBSTR(MEM.CPN_MEM_ISU_DT,1,8) END AS CPN_USE_ST_DT, CASE WHEN CPN_MST_ISU_DAY_GBN = 'A' THEN CPN_MST_USE_ED_DT WHEN CPN_MST_ISU_DAY_GBN = 'M' THEN TO_CHAR( LAST_DAY( TO_DATE(SUBSTR(MEM.CPN_MEM_ISU_DT,1,8),'yyyymmdd')) ,'yyyymmdd') ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(MEM.CPN_MEM_ISU_DT,1,8),'yyyymmdd') + NVL( CPN_MST_USE_DAY , 0 ),'yyyymmdd') END AS CPN_USE_ED_DT, CPN_MEM_USE_DT, CPN_MEM_USE_YN, CASE WHEN CPN_MEM_USE_YN = 'Y' THEN (SELECT O.ORD_MST_CD FROM T_ORD_MST O, T_ORD_CPN C WHERE C.ORD_MST_CD = O.ORD_MST_CD AND C.CPN_MST_IDX = CPN.CPN_MST_IDX AND O.ORD_MST_ORD_ID = MEM.CPN_MEM_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ELSE '-' END CPN_USE_ORD_NO FROM T_CPN_MST CPN, T_CPN_MEM MEM WHERE CPN.CPN_MST_IDX = MEM.CPN_MST_IDX AND MEM.CPN_MEM_ID = #{MEM_MST_MEM_ID} AND CPN.CPN_MST_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY CPN_MST_REG_DT DESC ) S1 ) S2 WHERE S2.RNUM BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}

/*Ecoupon.selectMemberCouponSum*/ SELECT SUM(CPN_A_CNT) AS CPN_A_CNT, SUM(CPN_U_CNT) AS CPN_U_CNT, SUM(CPN_N_CNT) AS CPN_N_CNT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd') BETWEEN CPN_USE_ST_DT AND CPN_USE_ED_DT AND CPN_MEM_USE_YN <> 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS CPN_A_CNT, CASE WHEN CPN_MEM_USE_YN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS CPN_U_CNT, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd') > CPN_USE_ED_DT AND CPN_MEM_USE_YN <> 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS CPN_N_CNT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN CPN_MST_ISU_DAY_GBN = 'A' THEN CPN_MST_USE_ST_DT ELSE SUBSTR(MEM.CPN_MEM_ISU_DT,1,8) END AS CPN_USE_ST_DT, CASE WHEN CPN_MST_ISU_DAY_GBN = 'A' THEN CPN_MST_USE_ED_DT WHEN CPN_MST_ISU_DAY_GBN = 'M' THEN TO_CHAR( LAST_DAY( TO_DATE(SUBSTR(MEM.CPN_MEM_ISU_DT,1,8),'yyyymmdd')) ,'yyyymmdd') ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(MEM.CPN_MEM_ISU_DT,1,8),'yyyymmdd') + NVL( CPN_MST_USE_DAY , 0 ),'yyyymmdd') END AS CPN_USE_ED_DT, CPN_MEM_USE_YN FROM T_CPN_MST CPN, T_CPN_MEM MEM WHERE CPN.CPN_MST_IDX = MEM.CPN_MST_IDX AND MEM.CPN_MEM_ID = #{MEM_MST_MEM_ID} AND CPN.CPN_MST_YN = 'Y' ) )

/* Ecoupon.selectMemberCouponListExcel */ SELECT S2.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, CPN_MST_IDX, CPN_MST_GBN_NM, CPN_MST_TITLE, CASE CPN_MST_SAL_GBN WHEN 'A' THEN TO_CHAR(CPN_MST_SAL_PRC, '9,999') || '%'
WHEN 'B' THEN TO_CHAR(CPN_MST_SAL_PRC, 'L999,999,999') ELSE TO_CHAR(CPN_MST_SAL_PRC, '999,999,999') || ' E-POINT' END AS CPN_MST_SAL_PRC, TO_CHAR(CPN_MST_MXM_PRC, 'L999,999,999') AS CPN_MST_MXM_PRC, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CPN_USE_ST_DT, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS CPN_USE_ST_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CPN_USE_ED_DT, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS CPN_USE_ED_DT, CASE WHEN CPN_MEM_USE_YN <> 'Y' AND SYSDATE > TO_DATE(CPN_USE_ED_DT,'yyyymmdd') THEN '사용기간만료' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CPN_MEM_USE_DT,'yyyymmddhh24miss'),'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') END AS CPN_USE_DT, CPN_USE_ORD_NO FROM ( SELECT CPN.CPN_MST_IDX, (SELECT CMM.CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CPN_MST CPN2 JOIN T_CMM_COM CMM ON (CPN2.CPN_MST_GBN = CMM.CMN_COM_ETC1) WHERE CMM.CMN_COM_UP_IDX = 3029 AND CPN2.CPN_MST_IDX = CPN.CPN_MST_IDX) AS CPN_MST_GBN_NM, CPN.CPN_MST_TITLE, CPN.CPN_MST_SAL_GBN, CPN.CPN_MST_SAL_PRC,
CPN.CPN_MST_MXM_PRC, CASE WHEN CPN_MST_ISU_DAY_GBN = 'A' THEN CPN_MST_USE_ST_DT ELSE SUBSTR(MEM.CPN_MEM_ISU_DT,1,8) END AS CPN_USE_ST_DT, CASE WHEN CPN_MST_ISU_DAY_GBN = 'A' THEN CPN_MST_USE_ED_DT ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(MEM.CPN_MEM_ISU_DT,1,8),'yyyymmdd') + CPN_MST_USE_DAY,'yyyymmdd') END AS CPN_USE_ED_DT, CPN_MEM_USE_DT, CPN_MEM_USE_YN, CASE WHEN CPN_MEM_USE_YN = 'Y' THEN (SELECT O.ORD_MST_CD FROM T_ORD_MST O, T_ORD_CPN C WHERE C.ORD_MST_CD = O.ORD_MST_CD AND C.CPN_MST_IDX = CPN.CPN_MST_IDX AND O.ORD_MST_ORD_ID = MEM.CPN_MEM_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ELSE '-' END CPN_USE_ORD_NO FROM T_CPN_MST CPN, T_CPN_MEM MEM WHERE CPN.CPN_MST_IDX = MEM.CPN_MST_IDX AND MEM.CPN_MEM_ID = #{MEM_MST_MEM_ID} AND CPN.CPN_MST_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY CPN_MST_REG_DT DESC ) S1 ) S2
